name: Dash&Gun
description:
Dash&Gun, My first ever finished game!

You control a circle that can dash and shoot explosive bullets, game currently only has 5 levels. (I have no idea if i will add more levels, I want to move onto another project)

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click to dash

Please give feedback by commenting, I am pretty new to game development so any feedback will be really helpful.

(I am not native, please forgive my grammar errors)
